attributes.action: Withdraw the rights of Asylum Seekers/Immigrants to stay in the UK
attributes.additional_details: This e-petition has been posted to give British citizens the opportunity to force parliament to debate the current trend of letting Asylum Seekers and Immigrants reside in the UK. The British Isles are facing many issues surrounding the economy, housing and employment which can be remedied by the correct management of the adult population/borders. This isn't about racism, it is about securing our children's futures, and those of our children's children.
